name: Call Of Battle:Greece Defence
description:
Defense Quest of Greece Call for Battle Greece Defense is a war game that need to be fought with great strategy to grab unlimited fun with real time action. Encounter with the deadliest enemy who wants to destroy the peace of Greece and lead them to the deadliest end of death is now your responsibility. Throw the evil enemies out of the Greece by showing them the power of great Lord and defense of Greece. Remember! Kill and eliminate enemy troops right on time before they get into the boundary line and break the law of Greece defense. Upgrade 4 different types of towers of defense to make the Greece safest place. Upgrading tower with keen strategy will lead you towards victory with assurance.

Go for Glory!! You’re a leader of this battle, go for glory, go for defense, it’s time to raise the voice of right and destroy the evil. Opponent army is equipped with a fighting equipment's and vessels for every type of attack. On land, water, island etc. different levels pursue different stories of defense and call for battle to save Greece. Fight with guts and go for the glory. It gets harder and harder so be sure to upgrade your weapons.

Game of Strategy!! Time is crucial so let your mind be sharp and assemble the weapon towers wisely and with keen strategy so that you can kill your enemy fast. But also be careful not to let them sneak in too close to you otherwise time will do no justice with defense.

Historic Story Line of Defending Greece The glory of Greece wasn’t digestible for enemies. They are the enemies of Greece but also enemies of peace. Unite the powers of whole brave army to protect Ancient Greece from enemy of evil. Throw the evil enemies out of the Greece by showing them the power of great Lord and defense of Greece. Remember! Kill and eliminate enemy troops right on time before they get into the boundary line and break the law of Greece defense.

Features of Defense
• Ancient story line to revive history
• Multiple levels of game play
• Multiple game play scenarios and missions, e.g. Island, Water etc.
• Combat vessels and towers for ultimate defense
• Upgrade tower for stronger defense and victory
• Exciting missions and quest to compete the defense of Greece.
• Strategic game play will leads you towards the victory as well as fun.
